T02TD1266E:24a-1: tri kra ma au ba de sha n'a ma /
T02TD1266E:24a-3: man ngag rim pa gsum pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD1266E:24a-4: dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1266E:24a-5: rnam 'byor bas thog mar rlung ma dang /
T02TD1266E:24a-6: gnyid ma rtse sprad la tsandal'i shin tu drag la yun thung bar spar te /
T02TD1266E:24a-7: des de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02TD1266E:24a-8: spyan la sogs pa'i rtog pa bsreg go //
T02TD1266E:24a-9: de ltar yang nas yang du bsregs pa dang /
T02TD1266E:24a-10: sbar bas phyi'i dngos po gang la dmigs shing bltas kyang 'phar zhing 'dar ba byung na sngags kyi rim pa mthar phyin pa yin te /
T02TD1266E:24a-12: bde ba chen po phab la nor bu'i dkyil du srog gi rlung bzung la sems rtse gcig tu shin tu bsgrims la yang dang yang du gtad do //
T02TD1266E:24a-13: de ltar gtad pa dang nor bu 'gas pa snyam byed cing mi bzod na /
T02TD1266E:24a-14: rdo rje'i rked par sems bde ba la yang dang yang du gtad /
T02TD1266E:24a-15: de ltar gtad pa dang bde bas mi bzod pa dang /
T02TD1266E:24a-16: rtsa bar bde ba la sems gtad /
T02TD1266E:24a-19: lte bar bde ba la sems gtad /
T02TD1266E:24a-20: de ltar gtad pa de yang mi bzod na de nas gyen du bzhi cha gcig gi gnas su sems gtad /
T02TD1266E:24a-21: de ltar sems gtad pa dang yang mi bzod na yang gyen du bzhi cha gcig gi nang du bde ba la sems gtad /
T02TD1266E:24b-0: de ltar gtad pa dang yang mi bzod na yang bzhi cha gcig gi gnas su bde ba la @24b sems gtad /
T02TD1266E:24b-2: yang bde ba mi bzod na snying gar bde ba la sems gtad /
T02TD1266E:24b-3: de ltar gtad pa na bde bas mi bzod cing snying 'dar zhing sprugs pa snyam byed na /
T02TD1266E:24b-4: yang gyen du bzhi cha gcig gi gnas su bde ba la sems gtad /
T02TD1266E:24b-5: de ltar gtad pa dang yang bde bas mi bzod na yang gyen du bzhi cha gcig gi gnas su bde ba la sems gtad /
T02TD1266E:24b-6: de ltar gtad pa dang bde bas yang mi bzod na bzhi cha gcig gi gnas su bde ba la sems gtad /
T02TD1266E:24b-7: de ltar gtad pa dang yang mi bzod na yang gyen du bzhi cha gcig tu bde pa la sems gtad /
T02TD1266E:24b-9: yang bde ba la mi bzod na /
T02TD1266E:24b-10: lkog mar bde ba la sems gtad /
T02TD1266E:24b-12: bde ba mi bzod ming yang gyen du bzhi cha gcig gi gnas su bde pa la sems gtad /
T02TD1266E:24b-14: mi bzod pa snyam byed na yang gyen du bzhi cha gcig gi gnas su bde ba la sems gtad /
T02TD1266E:24b-15: de ltar yang gtad pa dang mi bzod pa snyam byed na /
T02TD1266E:24b-16: skad 'gags pa snyam byed cing smra mi shes pa snyam byed pa na yang gyen du bzhi cha gcig gi gnas su bde ba la sems gtad /
T02TD1266E:24b-18: yang mi bzod pa snyam byed na yang gyen du bzhi cha gcig gi gnas su bde ba la sems gtad /
T02TD1266E:24b-20: yang mi bzod pa snyam byed na smin mtshams phrag tu bde ba la sems gtad /
T02TD1266E:24b-23: dngos po gang la dmigs shing bltas kyang smyos pa snyam byed na ye shes rim pa mthar phyin pa yin te /
T02TD1266E:24b-24: 'phro bcad pa la gsang ba'i rim pa la bya'o //
T02TD1266E:24b-25: der yang sna sgor dbugs bsdams /
T02TD1266E:24b-26: nang gi sems dang sems las byung bar chos thams cad 'dus pas phyi rol gyi yul la mi rtog par /
T02TD1266E:24b-27: nang gi sems kyi rtog pa'i byung tshor ci byung ba la mi dmigs par bsgom mo //
T02TD1266E:24b-28: de ltar bsgoms pa dang lus ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du yang zhing smig rgyu lta bu la sogs pa rtags lnga mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD1266E:24b-29: gsang ba'i rim pa mthar phyin pa yin te /
T02TD1266E:25a-0: de bas na nang gi sems dang phyi'i yul @25a * //
T02TD1266E:25a-1: thams cad dbyer mi phyed cing gnyis su med par mi dmigs par bsgom mo //
T02TD1266E:25a-3: mngon par shes pa lnga rim gyis skyes na bde ba chen po thob bo //
T02TD1266E:25a-4: ro smad bshal zhing mi theg pa snyam byed cing /
T02TD1266E:25a-5: 'grong gi phyag tu zung cing na na thur du sel ba'i rlung zin pas shin tu rgyas pa yin te /
T02TD1266E:25a-6: de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir smin phyag tu bde pa la sems gtad do //
T02TD1266E:25a-11: rna ba na zhing 'ur 'ur zer na gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung zin pas shin tu rgyas pa yin te /
T02TD1266E:25a-12: de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir lte bar bde ba la sems gtad /
T02TD1266E:25a-14: de ltar sems gtad pa dang /
T02TD1266E:25a-15: lte bar zug cing spos pa snyam byed na //
T02TD1266E:25a-16: me dang mnyam du gnas pa'i rlung zin pas rgyas pa yin te /
T02TD1266E:25a-17: de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir mgrin par bde ba la sems gtad /
T02TD1266E:25a-18: kha mchu spring cing skad 'gags pa snyam byed na /
T02TD1266E:25a-19: lce'i dbang po la gnas pa'i rlung zin pas shin tu rgyas pa yin te /
T02TD1266E:25a-20: de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir snying gar bde ba la sems gtad /
T02TD1266E:25a-21: de ltar gtad pa dang snying gcu zhing sprugs pa snyam byed na /
T02TD1266E:25a-22: rlung la gnas pa'i rlung zin pas rgyas pa yin /
T02TD1266E:25a-23: de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir nor bu'i dkyil du bde ba la sems gtad /
T02TD1266E:25a-24: de ltar gtad pa dang lus kyi tshigs thams cad na zhing spring ba snyam byed cing lus thams cad la ber ba langs na /
T02TD1266E:25a-25: khyab byed kyi rlung zin pas rgyas pa yin te /
T02TD1266E:25a-26: de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bde ba la rang bzhin med par bsgom mo //
T02TD1266E:25a-28: dgod snying 'dod cing ku co'i sgra 'don snying 'dod na shin tu rgyas pa bde ba la rgyas pa yin te /
T02TD1266E:25a-29: shin tu yang bsgrims la bde ba la mi dmigs par bsgom mo //
T02TD1266E:25a-30: de ltar bsgoms pa dang shin tu myos shing dran pa med cing rmongs na /
T02TD1266E:25a-31: zhi gnas shas che ba yin te /
T02TD1266E:25a-32: de med par bya pa'i phyir nang gi chos thams cad sgyur mar bsgom mo //
T02TD1266E:25a-33: de ltar bsgoms pa dang sems rgod cing 'phro na sgyu ma mi dmigs par bsgom /
T02TD1266E:25a-34: de ltar cha snyoms nas yang dang yang du bsgoms pas gsal ba rtog pa med pa skyes nas bde ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1266E:25b-0: gong ma de ltar bsgom @25b pa'i tshe mkha' 'gro ma nyams sad pa'i phyir 'od pa'i tshe brda bya'o //
T02TD1266E:25b-1: de ma shes na rtog pa med par bsgom mo //
T02TD1266E:25b-3: mkha' 'gro mas byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1266E:25b-4: 'gro kun gsang sngags don ldan zhing //
T02TD1266E:25b-5: che 'di nyid la byang chub thob par shog / man ngag rim pa gsum pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD1266E:25b-6: slob dpon chen po dom bi he ru ka'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
